content: our october makers league project takes an old favorite into a new era it s easy does it - cabled era jeri designed this pattern with a beautiful cable twist up each side the same easy garter stitch in between i mean look at that stitch definition we used a brand-new yarn - mirasol chusku it s 100% nonsuperwash corriedale and everything you could want in a yarn beautiful colors ethically sourced and outstanding stitch definition fun fact chusku means cross-breed - corriedale sheep were created by crossing a lincoln long-haired sheep with a merino sheep who knew we love we know you will too find the kits here 1 1 https //www darnknitanyway com/shop/c/p/easy-does-it-cabled-era---october-makers-x85365197 htm
